title: Have you ever felt that you were in love with a character in a novel? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yesssssss, sooo many times. i used to read a lot of books and still do; once i was reading a book about this eccentric clown guy who was so cool and magical and COOL you know, like he knew what he was talking about and he was pretty homey—someone i could relate too. On top of that he was supposed to be very good looking and other people couldn’t carry a conversation with him properly cuz he was too smart for them and what he said made sense after you read it like twice. it’s normal to fall in love with a character i guess, i mean, it happens once in a while but i guess you’ll get over it when someone walks into your life in reality.
Yes, more than once. Sadly, I am more likely to become attached to a fictional character than I am a real person. It’s the combination of interesting and relatable that draws me in.
